column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Everyone knows that cleanliness is close to Godliness .
#text=It was this mind frame that led me to take my third bath of the day a few minutes ago .
#text=I had decided to go outside and shoot my assault rifle and do some pistol drills since it was such a warm and beautiful day outside .
#text=The sweat started coming from my body as I trained hard and the spent gunpowder began to cling to my sweat moistened skin .
#text=Soon I was rather stinky and covered in gun powder .
#text=Time to go inside , clean my weapons and prepare a good hot bath .
#text=Not just any bath but one that is piping hot and with bubbles in it .
#text=I removed my clothing and carefully put one foot in the hot water .
#text=Very hot just the way I like it .
#text=I eased my body into the tub , lit a cigarette and soaked away the fatigue of my previous workout .
